question: Which one of the following will take place when a watch based on oscillating spring is taken to a deep mine?
option3: It will indicate the same time as on earth
answer: It will indicate the same time as on earth
explanation:
Oscillating period T = 2PI√x/g
x being the spring compression
g the gravitational field
as x = F/k = m*g/k , then √x/g becomes √m*g/(k*g) = √m/k = constant ..(having mass m and spring constant k always the same value everywhere)
and finally :
T = 2PI*constant = constant
even though in deep mines g becomes less than gravitation as sea level so It will indicate the same time as on earth.
